snippet: In a roadshow video, Facebook says it is likely to make more expensive investments to rev up its mobile presence. The video devotes considerable time to convince investors that advertising, which is Facebook's principal revenue source, is a promising...
abstract: In a roadshow video, Facebook says it is likely to make more expensive investments to rev up its mobile presence. The video devotes considerable time to convince investors that advertising, which is Facebook's principal revenue source, is a promising business.

headline.main: Don't Be Shocked by More Big Acquisitions, Facebook Says
